DataElement.preferredName: Emission Scan Post Tracer Injection Route of Administration Start Time Minute Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The number of minutes the emission scan started following injection of the tracer represented as a numerical value.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Procedure Domain Emission scan Post Tracer Injection Route of Administration Start Time Minute
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to procedure._The usual mode of scanner operation in which a tracer's distribution throughout a subject is detected for subsequent processing into an image._Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order._A substance that is identifiable by virtue of its radioactive signature, color, or other distinguishing physical property, such as a dye, radioactive isotope, or inert chemical, that is introduced into a biological or mechanical system and can be followed through the course of a process, providing information on the pattern of events in the process or on the redistribution of the parts, elements, or events involved._Administration of a drug into a location within the body; this can be achieved either through an established access or via a needle._The time at which something is to start or did start._A unit measure of time equal to 60 seconds.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to procedure.

Concepts.definition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to procedure.

Property.preferredName: Emission scan Post Tracer Injection Route of Administration Start Time Minute
Property.preferredDefinition: The usual mode of scanner operation in which a tracer's distribution throughout a subject is detected for subsequent processing into an image.:Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.:A substance that is identifiable by virtue of its radioactive signature, color, or other distinguishing physical property, such as a dye, radioactive isotope, or inert chemical, that is introduced into a biological or mechanical system and can be followed through the course of a process, providing information on the pattern of events in the process or on the redistribution of the parts, elements, or events involved.:Administration of a drug into a location within the body; this can be achieved either through an established access or via a needle.:The time at which something is to start or did start.:A unit measure of time equal to 60 seconds.

Concepts.definition: The usual mode of scanner operation in which a tracer's distribution throughout a subject is detected for subsequent processing into an image.
Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.

A substance that is identifiable by virtue of its radioactive signature, color, or other distinguishing physical property, such as a dye, radioactive isotope, or inert chemical, that is introduced into a biological or mechanical system and can be followed through the course of a process, providing information on the pattern of events in the process or on the redistribution of the parts, elements, or events involved.
Administration of a drug into a location within the body; this can be achieved either through an established access or via a needle.
The time at which something is to start or did start.
A unit measure of time equal to 60 seconds.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDISC Aligned NCI Standard Equivalent CDE
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is to be used for CDISC aligned data collection in place of CDE 3916051 from the original NCI Standard CRF Template.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CTEP Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: How many minutes post tracer injection did the PET scan start?

ReferenceDocuments.description: Minutes post tracer injection start time
